1.0.name: wordpress/ipage-slides
1.0.description:
About IPage Slides ?

IPage Slides allows you to display your blog post content as a dynamic slideshow. You can choose to autoplay the slideshow or manually control the slides. The purpose of this plugin is to let bloggers highlight their top content in limited space in an interactive way.

What can you do with IPage Slides

  • 1. Display your most recent blog post titles in home page.
  • 2. Change your blog advertisments dynamically.
  • 3. Display promotions and special offers.
  • 4. Create a blog post tutorial as a presentation.
  • 5. Create a Image Slideshow

Download IPage Slides and View Demos

http://www.innovativephp.com/ipage-slides

Now IPage Slides is Integrated into My Main Plugin IBlocks

htt
